nodes.documentation:
A Token Ranked List (TRL) enables voting with staked tokens periodically, over a registry of candidates
*
nodes.name: TRL

nodes.documentation:
Creates a new Instance of a Voting Lists
@param _tokenAddress Address of the token used as an incentive for the pool*

Initializes a new period, taking as the TTL value the current from storage, and setting the state to 1
Requires that the current period is Preparing (0)*
nodes.name: initPeriod
buyTokenVotes
vote

nodes.documentation: @dev Claims the correspondant Bounty from the Pool on the current periodIndex*
nodes.name: claimBounty

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the current period number*
nodes.name: currentPeriod

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the current stage number*
nodes.name: currentStage
canVote
calculateReward
